TextBlock.Text: DAVED: What is this goofy ahh solar system lol
DESTINY: I dunno, but we'd better explore. Our vessel ain't gonna fix itself...
DAVED: Well, there's some water over there. Maybe we can start by sifting metal.
HECTIR: I'm gonna start Minecraft-ing and make some tools and stuff.
DESTINY: Update, we got a good start. All of us Nomai are working hard to build shelters. I think we'll try and go to one of the two moons we keep seeing above us.
